query:
ALTER TABLE plans 
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS maxTeamMembers INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS boldPriceId VARCHAR(255),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS hasBackup BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT FALSE,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS has2FA BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT FALSE,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS hasAPI BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT FALSE,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS hasAlerts BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT FALSE,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS hasDashboard BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT FALSE,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS hasAudit BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT FALSE;
